title: The First Two Guests Confirmed!
content:
We're excited to announce the first two of our line up of guests this year for JAFAX 2020!

The fisrt new guest to JAFAX is Tia Ballard, an accomplished voice actor of animé and video games, writer, and director of English adaptations of popular animé titles. Her most recent roles include Zero Two from "Darling in the Franxx" and Kagura from the 2019 release of "Fruits Basket" and many, many more.

The next guest announcement is no stranger to JAFAX, Charles Dunbar. Charles brings to JAFAX his observations and insights of animé, con culture, and Japanese culture and mythology. His continued books and lectures on these topics and more have drawn interest from many whom are curious about the past and future of the animé fandom community.
